name: Boardlife
description:
Boardlife is my first game project at Forsbergs Skola, our task was to create a 2,5D platformer. 

I wanted to mix it with something more than just moving left or right, so thereby I decided to do some 2D snowboarding and include that into the game and create some simple mechanics round it.

I worked on this project for about 2 weeks  and I`ve been working in Unity 2018 and all the assets I`ve downloaded free from the asset store.
